items.name: Kyou Kara Maou!
items.title: Kyou Kara Maou!
items.headline: Get flushed away to Shin Makoku!
items.desc:
The Kyou Kara Maou wiki is a wiki is about the Kyou Kara Maou series. It covers everything about the series from the light novels, anime, and manga to the brand new musical and more! We're a growing community now with over 400 pages! Come check us out and join in on the fun!

If we collect enough information maybe we can finnally answer Miko's question: "Do mazoku have wings?"
